description:
I am using devstack on Ubuntu Server 12.04, the NoVNC module fails. The log shows that "oslo.config.cfg.NoSuchOptError: no such option: set_defaults".

cd /home/stack/openstack/nova && /usr/local/bin/nova-novncproxy --config-file /etc/nova/nova.conf --web /home/stack/openstack/noVNC || touch "/home/stack/openstack/status/stack/n-novnc.failure"
stack@shendian:~/openstack/horizon$ cd /home/stack/openstack/nova && /usr/local/ 
bin/nova-novncproxy --config-file /etc/nova/nova.conf --web /home/stack/openstac 
k/noVNC || touch "/home/stack/openstack/status/stack/n-novnc.failure"
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/local/bin/nova-novncproxy", line 9, in <module>
    load_entry_point('nova==2013.2.a1200.ga5cd0f8', 'console_scripts', 'nova-novncproxy')()
  File "/home/stack/openstack/nova/nova/cmd/novncproxy.py", line 54, in main
    CONF.set_defaults(CONF, web='/usr/share/novnc')
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/oslo/config/cfg.py", line 1187, in __getattr__
    return self._get(name)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/oslo/config/cfg.py", line 1509, in _get
    value = self._substitute(self._do_get(name, group))
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/oslo/config/cfg.py", line 1525, in _do_get
    info = self._get_opt_info(name, group)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/oslo/config/cfg.py", line 1625, in _get_opt_info
    raise NoSuchOptError(opt_name, group)
oslo.config.cfg.NoSuchOptError: no such option: set_defaults
title: NoVNC failure when use devstack on Ubuntu Server 12.04

comments.content:
I am using devstack on Ubuntu Server 12.04, the NoVNC module fails. The log shows that "oslo.config.cfg.NoSuchOptError: no such option: set_defaults".

cd /home/stack/openstack/nova && /usr/local/bin/nova-novncproxy --config-file /etc/nova/nova.conf --web /home/stack/openstack/noVNC || touch "/home/stack/openstack/status/stack/n-novnc.failure"
stack@shendian:~/openstack/horizon$ cd /home/stack/openstack/nova && /usr/local/ 
bin/nova-novncproxy --config-file /etc/nova/nova.conf --web /home/stack/openstac 
k/noVNC || touch "/home/stack/openstack/status/stack/n-novnc.failure"
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/local/bin/nova-novncproxy", line 9, in <module>
    load_entry_point('nova==2013.2.a1200.ga5cd0f8', 'console_scripts', 'nova-novncproxy')()
  File "/home/stack/openstack/nova/nova/cmd/novncproxy.py", line 54, in main
    CONF.set_defaults(CONF, web='/usr/share/novnc')
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/oslo/config/cfg.py", line 1187, in __getattr__
    return self._get(name)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/oslo/config/cfg.py", line 1509, in _get
    value = self._substitute(self._do_get(name, group))
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/oslo/config/cfg.py", line 1525, in _do_get
    info = self._get_opt_info(name, group)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/oslo/config/cfg.py", line 1625, in _get_opt_info
    raise NoSuchOptError(opt_name, group)
oslo.config.cfg.NoSuchOptError: no such option: set_defaults
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dianshen

comments.content: Yeah, it is exactly a bug, CONF.set_defaults(CONF, web='/usr/share/novnc') should be CONF.set_default('web', '/usr/share/novnc')
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~yugsuo

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/32931
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/32931
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/e50f14c098ebe3883e7dcc0ea001f274c6dd3fa3
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit e50f14c098ebe3883e7dcc0ea001f274c6dd3fa3
Author: Guangyu Suo <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Jun 14 01:35:46 2013 +0800

    Fix the wrong reference by CONF
    
    CONF.set_defaults(CONF, web='/usr/share/novnc') should be
    CONF.set_default('web', '/usr/share/novnc')
    
    Fixes: bug #1190628
    Change-Id: I7ff12d10ed423fa6518b8674b80d0e1cc1787a8b
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
